oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Simplicial embeddings between multicurve graphs
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Erlandsson, Viveka
Fanoni, Federica
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematics - Geometric Topology
Mathematics - Combinatorics
57M15, 05C60, 30F99
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We study some graphs associated to a surface, called k-multicurve graphs, which interpolate between the curve complex and the pants graph. Our main result is that, under certain conditions, simplicial embeddings between multicurve graphs are induced by $\pi_1$-injective embeddings of the corresponding surfaces. We also prove the rigidity of the multicurve graphs.
Comment: New introduction and some changes in Section 2, main results unchanged. References added. 18 pages, 5 figures
